QuestData.Title: A Possible Link
QuestData.Description: The furbolgs that live east of here are more aggressive and bestial than the ones we're used to. Our forces have squared off with them more than once, and the survivors always speak of a dark, slimy substance dripping from their corpses.$B$BTheir condition could be linked with the contaminants we found on Vordrassil's remains.$B$BBring me samples of the furbolgs' blood. You will find them in the Rage Fang Shrine and the Heart's Blood Shrine, far to the east.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hierophant Thayreen at Amberpine Lodge wants you to obtain 8 Crazed Furbolg Blood from the Furbolgs at Heart's Blood Shrine and Rage Fang Shrine.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you obtained the blood samples, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: The corruption present in this blood is identical to that of the slime. I don't have a good feeling about this.
